name: Sport Culture Media & Diplomacy
goal: The Association, Sport Culture Media & Diplomacy is a non profit organization which aims to create a world of peace through sport and culture. We develop several activities such as sports tournaments among diplomats, cultural events, high level panel meetings to discuss the future of sport and culture.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Culture, Development, Education, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: transparency in sport; Freedom ofmedia; common foreign Policy and neighbourhood policy
